Reviews.Title: no audio out
Reviews.Author: eyebeenthere
Reviews.Content: I just bought this apparently lovely product but had to return it because it lacks any type of audio output. I has neither digital nor analog audio output, not even a headphone jack. There is no way to connect an external sound system to the TV as you need to if using cable feed directly to the set. I see no other TV with this deficiency. The TV salesman at Costco had never noticed this and was, like me, shocked by the absence of any output connections. The comparable Samsung 42" has both digital and analog audio outputs. It costs $75 less.

Reviews.Title: Great Big Screen TV
Reviews.Author: BK
Reviews.Content: Since our 30 year old TV died recently, this is the first flat/big screen TV we have purchased.  This TV was easy to set up and we are loving it.I was told by my IT people at work that Samsung is the best, so that is why we purchased this TV.  We are extremely happy with this purchase and are enjoying the large screen, great color and sound.  Were told by a sales person at a big box store that we would need a sound bar, but since it is not inside an entertainment center, but is open to the room, the sound works wonderfully well in our ranch home living room.

Reviews.Title: I love this Samsung TV...
Reviews.Author: Kashigirl
Reviews.Content: My husband and I have become Samsung TV fans and this 40" flat screen did not disappoint us!  The picture is clear and the sound is good; no additional speakers are really needed in a smaller sized room.  Set up was a breeze!

Reviews.Title: Useless stand
Reviews.Author: D. Craig
Reviews.Content: TV has a nice picture and okay sound for a flat screen.  Nice set of features.  There is one major negative.  The TV stand for table mounting is completely useless.  It provides no stability, the TV slopes backwards slightly and it rocks with the application of an ounce or two of force.  There is no doubt that a child jumping up and down near the TV would cause it to topple.  As an engineer I was shocked that a major company would employ such an obviously deficient design.  Am returning to the store as the probability of the TV falling is simply to great to justify keeping it.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Penguins "MNWILD"
Reviews.Content: Good working TV. Great picture quality for the price. Good sound options with SRS HD. Easy to setup and operate.

Reviews.Title: Good basic HDTV
Reviews.Author: Mark S. Kennedy
Reviews.Content: Got it for a great price, works well, great picture. Easy to setup. Was perfect for our first HDTV. One drawback, no RCA audio out connections.

Reviews.Title: Works Great, Looks Great
Reviews.Author: Pepper Source IT Department
Reviews.Content: We are using 5 of these in an industrial environment inside of a weather proof enclosure to display production data and we haven't had 1 problem with any of them. The screen color looks great. The oldest one is  5 months old now and still working great.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: Michael Walter Conte
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV though an Amazon affiliate and it arrived within a couple of days so very pleased with the shipping. It arrived in excellent shape and had it installed and up and running in a few minutes. Picture quality is excellent and the built in sound system is very good. Not theater quality but still very clear, lots of audio and nice stereo quality and it's light making it easy to move around for cleaning and so on.I don't know about it's dependability since it's new but my other Samsung DLP projection TV has been running for seven years so I'd expect this new one would be even better. Would certainly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful picture & sound!
Reviews.Author: SueD "SueD"
Reviews.Content: What could be better than a large TV, delivered to your doorstep, easily set up, that provides great picture and sound quality!  Couldn't be happier with this purchase.  .

Reviews.Title: Samsung is awsome
Reviews.Author: bruschi5525 "bruschi75309"
Reviews.Content: I really like this tv, it's picture quality far outpasses me old box like tv. I like the user options in the menu and the audio sounds you can pick between the movies or sports.

Reviews.Title: Great value TV
Reviews.Author: gbashe
Reviews.Content: Bought and installed for my Mother in Law. It is her primary TV now and she loves it. Just a few clicks and it set up perfectly. Picture is great.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: Ronnie Negley
Reviews.Content: Great picture, terrific sound and the size is perfect in an average sized living room.  I would recommend this TV to everyone.

Reviews.Title: samsung tv
Reviews.Author: WILLIAM  A  PRIESTLEY
Reviews.Content: the samsung ln46e550 46- inch 1080p 60hz lcd hdtv arrived ingood condition. the reception and the sound is outstanding. i would reccomend it to anybody

Reviews.Title: Great picture, but watch out for problems
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture, Samsung quality, but I agree with the other reviews including a) terrible sound, b) no audio output connection other than the standard A/V RCA cable that goes to your cable box, and c) poorly designed stand that doesn't swivel. Beware of the "surround sound" offered by these TVs; such a title is dubious at best.  Sound is tinny and weak, coming out of the metal back.  Some sounds caused rumbling against the speaker casing.  Poor design by Samsung.  Absolutely requires a soundbar, and I'm no audiophile requiring home theater and such.  Also agree with another review on the lack of audio outputs. Had to hook up the soundbar to my cable box. Strange that Samsung would not offer this basic feature that you see in virtually all other TVs. Regarding the TV stand, there are two flimsy screws used to keep the TV "stable." Indeed, lightly pushing the TV could cause it to topple over.  I got this TV for an incredibly low price, but be aware of these deficiencies before you purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price!!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research before buying a TV and this was the best value/quality for the money. After researching I had narrowed my choice down to about 3 tv's and went to a local store to see them in person and was blown away by the picture quality of this one.This tv replaced an old CRT hand-me-down tv. I don't have cable and didn't want a super expensive fancy tv and this was exactly what I needed. No, it doesn't have audio out-put but neither do many others in this price range. The sound is somewhat tin-canny but so are most other flat screen tvs.It works perfectly for my needs, I have my antenna and xbox hooked up and may connect my computer later on. Over the air tv looks good and so does my xbox. I'm not a big gamer so the 60Hz is fine for me.

Reviews.Title: good tv
Reviews.Author: Bob Merriman
Reviews.Content: the picture is good, but i have seen better, although the price was much higher. I would not hesitate to buy another samsung product.

Reviews.Title: Works perfect for what we needed!
Reviews.Author: Marsha
Reviews.Content: Needed a set that would work for both our bar area & the game room.  Mounted on a wall mount that swivels & it is perfect for the area!  Just the right size & the picture is beautiful.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV for the price
Reviews.Author: J. Michaelson "GO PACK GO"
Reviews.Content: Needed a TV for the master bedroom, and for under $400, this fits the bill.  Sound is ok, and picture is fine....all in all, it's a good buy at the price.  I just cannot believe how much difference 55" is from 40".....lol.  Getting older I guess.

Reviews.Title: Good picture.  One quirk of the TV - the backlight affects TiVo remote control.
Reviews.Author: Johnny Knight
Reviews.Content: We have been happy with this TV so far.  Picture quality is fine for a 60Hz screen.  The sound quality is decent but not great.  I wish it had an audio jack to attach external speakers.  That's my only complaint, except...A note to fellow TiVo subscribers.  This TV's backlight control affects the TiVo remote.  I had to comb through the TiVo forums to figure this out, because unfortunately the TiVo support people had not encountered this problem before.  We like to watch the TV fairly dim (bright screens give my wife headaches).  We turned the backlight on our TV down to a very low level, and within minutes our TiVo remote had stopped talking to the TiVo box.  Of course, we didn't make the connection right away.  I tried replacing the remote batteries, I tried rebooting the TiVo, I tried updating the firmware, all to no effect.We called TiVo support and they concluded that our TiVo box was defective.  So they shipped us a replacement box.  Of course, the same thing happened again.  So we had gone to the trouble of shipping off our old TiVo box, had to have Comcast come and install a new cablecard in the new unit, and lost a bunch of recorded shows on the old box for nothing.Since then we have found that if we keep the backlight setting at 2 or above on the TV, the TiVo remote is not affected.I only put this in the review to help out other TiVo subscribers.  Other than that, the TV has been fine.

Reviews.Title: This TV is Nice!
Reviews.Author: gamer
Reviews.Content: I was very impressed with this television.  Its picture quality is awesome and the sound is great too. If you need a new tv then this one will be great for you!

Reviews.Title: Great TV.  Granny and Daddy Bill
Reviews.Author: Willie K
Reviews.Content: We have 4 Samsung high definition tv's.  Each of them, including this one,  is tops as far as we are concerned.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Ronald Trowbridge
Reviews.Content: Used for gaming and TV Great picture Hooked up sound (has good sound out of box) Shop around and walmart (out of stock ) amazon had the same price with quicker delieveryIs top heavy made clamps to hold it from tipping over (this is a problem with flat screens)

Reviews.Title: Samsung Flat Screen HD TV
Reviews.Author: Robert H. Moody
Reviews.Content: The product arrived on schedule in good condition.  The tech who installed my new digital service installed the set and ensured it was working 100%.  I am very pleased with the product and consider it to be an excellent value.

Reviews.Title: Trouble free for years
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This TV has been great. Picture images are fantastic. It handles everything I need. 3 HDMI inputs are used for cable, dvd and computer inputs. It has a coax cable input that I don't even use. I've never had any trouble with it. Visitors comment on how good the images look.

Reviews.Title: Better than I expected
Reviews.Author: Bob Ross
Reviews.Content: I first bought a lesser know brand for the basement before I bought the Samsung. The price was almost identical. The difference in picture quality is unmistakable. Even a 10 year old noticed it.

Reviews.Title: Great flat screen tv
Reviews.Author: Mary OBrien
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love our new Samsung tv.  Has a beautiful picture, excellent color and depth.  Will definitely recommend this tv to friends

Reviews.Title: No audio/video outputs
Reviews.Author: nick
Reviews.Content: Very disappointing! Picture quality is great. Sound quality was great. Until I blew the speakers. I admit, my fault. I like to listen to my movies loud. Once the speakers were blown, I bought a samsung home theatre system to fix my speaker problems, but come to find out, THERE IS NO AUDIO/VIDEO OUTPUTS. I can not return the t.v. since it was purchased in the late summer of 2012. One would think that if a t.v. has a power button, it would also have all the audio/video inputs and outputs. Who thinks to check this when shopping anywhere? I didn't. I see others also didn't. Also it is pretty hard to see the back of a t.v. while it is on display, since they are hanging from fixed mounting brackets at the store. The box also doesn't indicate this. It may say audio input, but lacks to say no output. Once again, my fault for not realizing this. Hopefully myself, others and Samsung will also learn to make sure that all of the t.v.'s have at least the basic essentials that we all grew up with. Otherwise, there is no chance to have any sort of home theatre system in your home, which I personally was really looking forward to. I DON'T RECOMMEND IF YOU WANT SURROUND SOUND. Hopefully this was helpful to at least one person.

Reviews.Title: TV Scores!
Reviews.Author: Deborah A. Sweeney "mangomadness"
Reviews.Content: Great brand of electronics, nice size.  The price was excellent and we really enjoyed watching the SuperBowl on it!  Now if only we had won the game...

Reviews.Title: sound stop working fine after few months
Reviews.Author: Juan
Reviews.Content: Tv was working fine but after a few months, started to make bad noises, the failure sometimes goes and comes.

Reviews.Title: Serious audio shortcomings
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I didn't buy this TV from Amazon, I bought it locally, but since it's still being sold I wanted to put in my 2 cents worth.  From a video standpoint, the picture is pretty good, I have no complaints there.  The sound however is mediocre at best.  Even with a number of options for tailoring the audio output most of them are unusable.  Any one of the options that enhances the bass causes the TV to rattle and the sound at times is so distorted as to be positively painful.  I don't watch this TV very often , my kids do but recently I've spent more time than usual and it really started bothering me but, no biggie, I'll just hook up a soundbar which I'd planned on doing anyway.  Well it ain't that easy because there are no outputs for audio of any kind.  My own fault, I just kind of assumed that at a minimum there would be a headphone jack but such is not the case.  Now I see some people have had good things to say about the sound and others have found it lacking; just know that if you don't like it, there's not really anything you can do about it.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: A. Gift For You "Shmuel"
Reviews.Content: I know televisions fairly well and am extremely picky about my electronics. I got a 46" for $400. So, expectations were tempered. At 60 Hz, they were even more tempered. This television blew me away. There's zero motion blur, it came pretty decently calibrated right out of the box (needed some tweaking with my absurdly naturally bright living room), and the sound is not lacking at all assuming you're not stuffing it in an entertainment center. The outputs aren't an issue. You're home theater system should have a decent receiver for your input components in the first place. If you're trying to do something like use a 3.5 mm connection (headphone jack), you probably shouldn't be doing that anyway. The tv's plenty loud and clear for casual viewing. The colors are really sharp and bright. I previously had a 42" Vizio with similar specs, but the Samsung just looks better. Did a side by side with the old tv, both running HDMI and the Samsung was the clear winner.I've read concerns about the tv not having buttons. It does, in fact, have buttons. They're just touch sensitive like older PS3's. No need to worry, though. They're really responsive.This is a great item.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Rita
Reviews.Content: Picture clarity is great, of course some of that is based on incoming signal.  I have no complaints and have always liked the Samsung tv.

Reviews.Title: Samsung quality.
Reviews.Author: Public Name
Reviews.Content: This set has worked as advertised, came in proper condition. No dead pixels, lives up to product specs. Next TV purchase will most likely be an upgraded model, in time.

Reviews.Title: For the price, I think this is a good HDTV
Reviews.Author: L. Stomel
Reviews.Content: I have been watching this TV for about a month now and considering it cost me less than $350 (a refurb) I can say it is a good product.  I have another 40-inch HDTV that retails for about $1,000 and the picture quality is much better than this Samsung.Pros:1.  The menu allows for a great deal of control on the color, sharpness, sound and many more features.2.  The setup is very simple, right out of the box.3.  Plenty of input choices: HDMI, Composite, RCA and of course Coax Cable.3.  The picture quality is . . . . well, good for a $350 HDTV.Cons:1. There are no audio or visual out-jacks, not even a headphone plug.  This is a problem because the native sound quality is fair to poor.  My workaround was to buy the new Roku box which includes a bluetooth headphone jack.  Setting it up like this, the sound is awesome (through Bose headphones, not through speakers).2. The screen is matte coated, so the dark tones look flat or the blacks look grey instead of rich.  However the matte coating does prevent distracting reflections on the screen.3. The 60Hz refresh rate.  A 120Hz or higher really makes a big difference in the picture quality.Overall, you can't expect a $350 HDTV to compare well to a $1,000 HDTV.  With that caveat, I think this is a good TV for the price.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: madameghosts
Reviews.Content: I don't care about attaching an external sound system, so this TV is great.I knew 40" was going to be a big TV, but I didn't have a very good grasp on exactly how large that is. I was really pleased when I took it out of the box.The sound and color are both good, much clearer picture than my old TV.No complaints, really.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely worth your money...
Reviews.Author: Riaz Ahmad
Reviews.Content: Looks good, and works great for my needs. I have it in the home office as a second set but spend more time in front of this than my 50" panasonic.

Reviews.Title: Simple and Well Built
Reviews.Author: Brian .M
Reviews.Content: I won this Tv at a work party. I am very impressed with it and recommend it highly. I have it mounted in my bedroom and it looks great. Very rich sound in a smaller room.

Reviews.Title: Good value.
Reviews.Author: swintero
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture and sound.  Works great with the PS3 my son uses it for.  Easy controls.  No complaints.  Good value.

Reviews.Title: Best picture and value
Reviews.Author: J. M. Batic
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for a spare bedroom and it worked out perfectly. The picture is great , the sound is perfect for films and tv. Best of all  is the low price. This TV did not sacrifice anything to achieve the lower price.

Reviews.Title: Great Product !
Reviews.Author: Richard Lindstrom
Reviews.Content: This product was all that I expected. Delivered in good condition with great packaging. I had it up and running in no time, even with the limited technical knowledge I have.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Judy in Evanston
Reviews.Content: Great TV - excellent value and easy to program - exactly as described.  Good way to upgrade without breaking the bank.

Reviews.Title: A definite wow
Reviews.Author: Patricia Gray
Reviews.Content: My husband wanted a "better" TV than the LCD he had in his den.  When he first turned the Samsung on, he was hooked.  The picture is bright, sharp and the color is fantastic. We ordered the 40" due to space considerations, but now I am thinking of replacing the 42" in the family room.  It is that much better.

Reviews.Title: A good value for an LCD
Reviews.Author: Jason Snyder
Reviews.Content: Shows a little better contrast than the LG I bought earlier in the year. Setup menus are a bit hard to navigate, especially when setting up channels. Confusing, when told only two channels found, but fully programed the cable channels. A good value for the LCD lineup.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: zachary
Reviews.Content: Bought this for myself for Christmas.  Great picture.  My only complaint is that the MediaPlay software included in the T.V. will not play movies from USB.  Other than that this definitely a good purchase.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for price
Reviews.Author: AS
Reviews.Content: The TV for the price when I purchaused it was a great deal.  The picture quality is really good.  Connective to other devices really ease.  Only complaint is now USB connective for mp4s.  Wish there was a software update that could fix that.

Reviews.Title: lack of inputs / outputs really ruins this tv. motion blurr
Reviews.Author: findinghomer
Reviews.Content: This tv has zero audio output to hook a surround directly to it. That's not a huge deal breaker bc you can always connect all of your devices to your sound system then out to the tv. Pain , but at least you can use surround.....was goin to live with that until....My major gripe is you basically get one hdmi, and one of the following two inputs. either rca composite, or component. But you cannot have both bc they share a common terminal.. so essentially you can hook only two devices up at once,  for me ps3 through hdmi, then my satellite tv through composite. My DVD remains unhooked as it uses component cables (remember you can only use one or the other)Picture quality is pretty good but you really have to make some adjustments the 60hz refresh rate causes some major motion blur..  if this tv were under 500 bucks might be worth it as a cheapy just for gaming or a tv room. I wouldn't recommend this tv at all as a main television, you're really limited. Ill be returning

Reviews.Title: Best tv.
Reviews.Author: Majehol
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture and very fast service.  Would hightly reccomend this tv to anyone.  It is one of the best I have ever owned.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Carlton Robinson "carlton robinson"
Reviews.Content: excellent picture quality. Light weight. customer was very satisfied. the blacks are deep so too the whites. Great TV overall.

Reviews.Title: Totally delighted! The first thing I do when I get homeis turn on my tv. When dining with friends all I talk about is my tv. I l
Reviews.Author: judi pickler
Reviews.Content: This is the best tv I have ever owned encluding home theaters. The color is perfect and very easy to program stations plus other options. Overall the price, size and delivery was excellent. Thank You!!

Reviews.Title: Samsung 40 LCD
Reviews.Author: James Richard
Reviews.Content: As advertised. Setup menu is very easy and TV has a better than expected picture. Would recommend this TV. One word of caution: the wall mount bracket we purchased came with an assortment of bolts...the ones which appeared to be roughly 1/4" fit through the the plastic backing but did not fit the threaded hole. The bolt pushed the threaded plate loose from the plastic panel. I was able to repair this condition but this could be an issue for some.

Reviews.Title: Great Tv for the money .
Reviews.Author: usbaggies
Reviews.Content: Great Tv for the money . Picture qulaity is nice and easy to hook up . You can't beat Samsung for flat panel Tv's I have 4 of them .

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I expected
Reviews.Author: C. Lawson
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my bedroom and it works perfectly.  It was easy to mount and the picture is very clear.  My only regret, not buying a bigger size!!

Reviews.Title: Samsung 40 inch HDTV
Reviews.Author: Gazel
Reviews.Content: Excellent!  Found the product at a great price.  The TV has excellent picture and sound quality and very easy to operate.  Love it.

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS  SAMSUNG TV
Reviews.Author: pat b.
Reviews.Content: I love the high gloss screen and Samsung even provided a special, small cloth with which to clean the high gloss areas that seem to attract dust.  The picture is gorgeous!  The set itself is sleek and good-looking and the sound is perfect.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Bargain for a Samsung
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: I like the brand Samsung, it is much better quality than many of the others.  The picture is sharp and it performs well.  I like the picture, sound, and everything about it.  I placed it on my wall so that I would have more space.  We are an older couple and space is a premium in our home. I found the instructions easy to follow and setup was easily done.  I had a neighbor help me mount it to the wall, it takes two persons to do this safely.  The anchors hold to the wall very well.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Matt Dawkins
Reviews.Content: Love it.  Can't find a better deal on a budget big screen hdtv.  Great picture, sound, and peripheral options to use.

Reviews.Title: No Bells and whistles
Reviews.Author: Shaylene D Small
Reviews.Content: A great price for an affordable TV.  We needed one that would fit in a built in entertainment center.  The sound quality is poor like many other TV's.

Reviews.Title: Exactly What I Wanted!!
Reviews.Author: Nicole
Reviews.Content: This TV went into my bedroom and is my first flat screen (feel free to welcome me into this century). It's perfect for nights I want to relax in my room without my glasses and still be able to zoom the screen to actually watch what's playing without squinting.

Reviews.Title: Amazon is the BEST!!
Reviews.Author: sje
Reviews.Content: I originally ordered this TV on the Cyber Monday sale in late November. I bought it for my master bedroom which was under renovation. The unit was delivered promptly and I placed in a back bedroom for storage until my master suite was complete. Well 1 week ago I went to open and set up the TV in my newly renovated bedroom to find that the LCD was cracked inside the box. I promptly call Amazon's customer service to report this. I was nervous that after having the TV a little over 2 mos that they would not give me a replacement. Well, I was wrong! The customer service rep was amazing!! She placed a order for a new unit that evening with free one day shipping and coordinated UPS to pick up the damaged unit from my house! I was so impressed! Will continue to order with Amazon... No questions asked! Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Samsung 40 " TV
Reviews.Author: Sue Reader "Sue"
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with it so far.  I am hesitant because my previous, a Vizio, lasted a month beyond warranty, was repaired on extended warranty then lasted another seven months.  At that point I gave it up as a bad experience so I will be more definite when it has lasted several years.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: CJ Kincaid
Reviews.Content: I have a 46" Samsung in my living room and when looking for a new TV for my smallish bedroom I came across this 40" Samsung.  I was a bit hesitant to go this big with the size of our bedroom but the TV is a perfect fit.  It's not over powering for the room.  Great picture, great looks, and compared to a lot of the other brand tvs I was looking at it also had a great price.  VEry satisified with this buy and would recommend it to anyone considering a smallish tv.

Reviews.Title: Great TV !
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Garrett
Reviews.Content: This is the second Samsung TV we bought, Really like as has a great picture. The shipping came faster than expexted and my husband got to watch SEC championhip game! great veiwing and simple to get set up and working!  (it also helped that Alabama won!)

Reviews.Title: Needs new-style antenna but really good
Reviews.Author: LavenderPenguin
Reviews.Content: I needed a simple modern TV for my mom, to replace the 100 lb Sony 30" tube TV she had for years. Granted, the Sony was the best of its day so it had to be better quality and cost efficient. We saw this model at a K-Mart but they were out of them so I ordered the first TV via Amazon Prime - I worry about delivery for delicate items...Anyway. after arriving safe-n-sound, the TV quality is good at 1080p but for some reason, the air signal receiver is not as good or sensitive as  the Zenith stand-alone receivers that the Sony was using and considering I live in Downtown L.A, I wondered what else was wrong. That was a HUGE appointment. After a week of choppy TV, we bit the bullet and bought a new antenna and cable. http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B000HSEMPO/ref=oh_details_o00_s00_i00  "RCA DH50QCR 50-Feet Quad Shield Coax Cable"http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0024R4B5C/ref=oh_details_o00_s01_i00 "RCA ANT751R Outdoor Antenna Optimized for Digital Reception"HOLY SMOKES... The images are spectacular and now the TV found 150+ channels, up from 110 before.As long as the TV doesn't break down within the next two years...a great and (relatively) inexpensive upgrade.So i'm deducting 1 star for the weak receiver. Everything else is really good.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Richele Pierson
Reviews.Content: Fantastic tv!  Great quality picture and sound for a great price.  This is my first purchase of a flat screen over 32" and I'm very impressed with Samsung.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: rhoni
Reviews.Content: We already have this T.V. upstairs, love it.  We decided to put one downstairs in the "man cave".  Then my in-laws' Sony finally quit.  They wanted a recommdation for a new one.  We of course suggested this one.  We waited for a great sale,  Amazon had it for a terrific price.  We ordered 2,  they came earlier than were expected,  Thanks again!  Way to go Amazon! (again)

Reviews.Title: Great Picture.
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: I have only one problem with this t.v.  Not enough hook ups in back for your accessories.  We have an older sound system and don't have a blu ray player and don't plan to get one unless there is no other choice. We had to hook everything up through the sound system, which is fine except we have 4 remotes to deal with.  Awesome picture though, am going to buy another in the next 6 months from amazon!!  Love the 2 day free shipping, almost forgot to mention that!!  Well worth the yearly fee!!! Thanx Amazon. :)

Reviews.Title: Good Size for small Living Room
Reviews.Author: Lee A Jorgensen
Reviews.Content: Arrived Fed-Ex at 1:30,  Up and running on Dish by 4:30. Great picture!!! Able to watch all the football games on flat screen. Good size for small living room - 8 to 10 ft. viewing distance.

Reviews.Title: Good picture...awful sound
Reviews.Author: libratravel "libratravel"
Reviews.Content: We kept the TV for about 2 weeks and we could not stand the terrible sound quality. The speakers sound like they were the quality of an iphone. The picture was good...but we couldn't stand the audio. It was so awkward that the TV sounded louder from the side. The audio wasn't projected toward the viewer. Just replaced it with a JVC 42" and are MUCH happier.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "SF Wino"
Reviews.Content: The TV fit exactly where I needed it to and was easy to set up. Clear picture and I'm enjoying it.

Reviews.Title: Great brand, great price
Reviews.Author: Marcos J. Perez
Reviews.Content: Got this during Cyber week.  I could have paid the same for a larger TV at a store, but I thought it was better to buy Samsung over Westinghouse - and I'm very glad I made that choice.  This TV is truly superior to the cheap black Friday blowout brands (Westinghouse, etc.)  That said, my TV may have a small defect as I can see a small cloudy ring at the top of the TV from an angle.  I don't know if that's the nature of the TV or if it is a defect.  I am still within the return/exchange window so I may look into that.  But my kids absolutely love the TV for their media room and I'm very happy with the purchase.  I would recommend this.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 40" LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Mike Browne
Reviews.Content: Great product at a nice discount ... already in-place in our master bedroom and working swell. Love it, love, love it!

Reviews.Title: NO AUDIO OUTPUT JACKS!
Reviews.Author: V-Tran
Reviews.Content: Disappointed in Samsung for not giving this TV audio output jacks so you can connect to a receiver or other output. Ebay item number 221156873902 solves this problem, but still, this is uncharacteristic of Samsung.  This is a 4-star TV, but the lack of audio output really sets it back big time.  Had I known, I would have purchased another model with output jacks.Picture is pretty good and sound is fine.  Has 2 HDMI inputs and component.  If you want a basic TV and can live without the RCA out, this is OK.

Reviews.Title: No Audio Out Capability
Reviews.Author: Martin Rizzo
Reviews.Content: This TV came with our new 2014 RV. 45' High End. After trying to figure out why I could only get audio out of the TV speakers and not into the Great Samsung Entertainment Center that also came with the RV I decided to take the TV off the mount and see what was not hooked up correctly. Guess what I found-NO AUDIO OUT DV JACK OR ANYTHING! Totally blown away by Samsung's lack of thought on this otherwise great TV!

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Joan Penfold
Reviews.Content: TV worked for about 3 months then just quit working. I will say the company sent out a tech promptly and also ended up replacing the TV but the whole thing was a hassle.  The new TV has been great without issues!

Reviews.Title: No buttons!
Reviews.Author: Jolon G. Bankey
Reviews.Content: Terrific TV except-- no buttons for any controls, and no sound output options! Don't lose your remote or you are in for some rust ration..

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: RaAnn Nerud
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure I was ready for a t tv this size, but I like and it has a good picture. So I like watching it. It's good to watch good movies on.

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV FOR THE PRICE
Reviews.Author: Bill Wildman "Bill Wildman"
Reviews.Content: DIDN'T GET THIS TV AT AMAZON BUT AT BEST BUY.(HAD A BUNCH OF GIFT CARDS).PROS;PICTURE AT 1080i AND 720i IS EXCELLENT-SMOOTH PICTURE QUALITY  SOUND QUALITY IS VERY GOODCONS:NO COMPUTER VIDEO CONNECTION  480i SOMEWHAT BLURRY (USING ANTENNA SOURCE)  LIMITED HDMI AND AUDIO INPUTSI DON'T NEED THE ADDITIONAL AUDIO INPUTS OR THE HDMI. OVERALL EXCELLENT TV FOR UNDER 500 DOLLARS

Reviews.Title: perfecto
Reviews.Author: Jesus Guevara
Reviews.Content: perfecto todo muy bien lo recomiendo al 100% seguro y confiable llego muy rapido y sin ninguna novedad excelente me agrado

Reviews.Title: Not a good television!
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: my second try with this television--I am sending it back--Samsung made an appt with me to comme out and fix this one and then never showed up--forget it--sending it back!!

Reviews.Title: Great Tv issues with sound
Reviews.Author: Cassondra C. Cosby
Reviews.Content: The TV came to me fast and quick. Hooked it up no issues. I got the HDMI hook up from my PS3 running with NETFLIX. The only issues I have is sound crackling or pop-ing. I can live with it, slightly distracting but other than that a great buy.

Reviews.Title: tv
Reviews.Author: Edward J Boyan Jr.
Reviews.Content: I am a electronic dummy and managed to set it upw/min.trouble. needed help and new cable assy.to set up sons PS3...

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Delia Ortega
Reviews.Content: I own Samsung TVs and I bought this TV for my parents. Samsung builds products to last and this TV is not the exception. My parents love it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Great price, Easy set-up
Reviews.Author: L. J. Ballerine "Mt. Meeker"
Reviews.Content: We are delighted with the quality of this Samsung TV. It arrived quickley, was a delight to set up even for a man with electronic disability. Couldn't be happier!

Reviews.Title: Samsung...I love it.
Reviews.Author: BeaChakra "MeeMom"
Reviews.Content: Good choice and it arrived in 2 days, as advertised.  I like being a PRIME member and Amaza makes it so easy to ship to multiple places.

Reviews.Title: How did this TV get such high reviews?
Reviews.Author: Catherine Lavallee
Reviews.Content: I'm a little bit frustrated with you Amazon reviewers. I went to Walmart today to buy a television, and before I selected this TV I scanned it to read the reviews. I saw it had 4 and a half stars so I thought how could I go wrong? I should have read the reviews, and I would have found out the big problem. The speakers are just terrible. It distorts quite a bit and the volume is very low.It also lacks an audio output which means that we can't use any other speakers with the television. It also doesn't have very many inputs so we aren't going to be able to plug in our DVD player if we want to have the Wii plugged into it. I expected more from Samsung. We will be returning this television tomorrow. Planning to either buy 1 from Amazon, or pick up a Vizio at Walmart. I have to wonder if the people who gave this TV high ratings have eardrums? How can you not hear that distortion?

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: James P. Wood
Reviews.Content: So far this TV has performed very well. It was exremely easy to set up. I am very satisfied with the Samsung 40" TV at this time.

Reviews.Title: A+
Reviews.Author: jacob
Reviews.Content: I did not buy this offline i bought in store at walmart 3 1/2 years ago for $800 its a great tv never have had a problem. Im a gamer and enjoy blue ray and this tv looks great ive love my samsung tv.

Reviews.Title: Broken in 7 weeks
Reviews.Author: ryan reeves
Reviews.Content: Cheap parts and horrible version of a TV. After 7 weeks the TV won't even turn on. Whenever I turn it on the sound plays that the system is booting up, the red lights blink and then the system appears to be on. However, if you try to turn it back off, it simply replays the same sequence. It's stuck in "off" mode and will now have to be sent off for repair. Samsung clearly rushed this and put inferior parts/labor into this line.Stay away.....stay far away.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG DISSAPOINTMENT
Reviews.Author: levelone
Reviews.Content: I have had 3 Samsungs. 2 were LCD monitors, and the 3rd a very Expensive $2,000.00 46 inch lcd tv.  Both of my Monitors failed after 2 years.  The 46 Inch Samsung LCD TV started having problems about the same time, but is still limping on. I have had it about 4 years now.. The Samsung will cycle power on its own. And it is getting worse and the Analog tuner section is failing.  I have always loved the Picture quality of the Samsung, but the reliability is terrible !  I just bought the JVC LCD to Replace the Samsung.  I will review I will not be buying any more Samsung Anything..  Also.. I have had a HAIER in my Bedroom for 3 years now. It is excellent even though the picture is not as good as the Samsung.. Not many TV have as good a picture as the Samsung.. But.. The reliability is so bad.. I will not go near a Samsung any more.. Like I said.. I have had 2 Samsung Computer monitors and 1 46 Inch TV.. All three have failed in less than 4 years..  Samsung is bad news.. Stay away..

Reviews.Title: USEFUL AS A MONITOR ONLY -- NO AUDIO OUTPUTS!!!
Reviews.Author: Jason Solo
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV after reading all the positive reviews about it, but when I finally got around to opening it up, I discovered that this TV has NO AUDIO OUTPUTS.If you're not familiar with the lingo, what that means is that you can only get sound out of this TV from its own speakers -- you can't connect it to your home stereo system or to a soundbar. Moreover, the internal speakers on this TV are NOT VERY GOOD -- to the point that we often can't understand the dialogue in a movie or TV show. Unfortunately for me, I let the TV sit around in the box for several weeks so it's too late for me to return it, so I'm selling it on Craig's List and buying another set.THIS TV IS ONLY USEFUL IF YOU'RE GOING TO BE USING IT SOME PLACE WITHOUT SOUND -- for instance, as a large monitor screen.There's really no reason for Samsung to even make such a crippled device...I can only imagine that they do it so they can trick some people (like me) into buying the cheapest model.As you can probably tell, I feel tremendously ripped off. There are plenty of good and even great TVs out there in the same price range that have a NORMAL set of audio outputs. Unless you just need a big silent monitor, do yourself a favor and buy any TV but this one.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: The Heat Is ON
Reviews.Content: Cheaper at Newegg- should have shopped around- i think even walmart had a better price-esp.Walmart had a better warranty.Oh well.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG MISCONCEPTIONS
Reviews.Author: Phyne Hartwig
Reviews.Content: I haven't had this tv for 2 months and it has gone berserk.  I talked with technician and described what it was doing and he said it needed a new panel.  Sounds to me like this is a natural thing with this tv (no wonder it is so cheap).  I have to wait 5 to 7 days for them to order it.  They never even came by to check it out, was just certain that's what it was.  It used to take 15 to 20 years for me ever to have a problem with a tv, generally longer.  I think the worst thing they ever did was go to digital tv.  I have had to throw away all my small tv's and portable tv's, which I could have fallen back on when this one went out and now I have to go to my bedroom or study to watch anything.  My little 10 inch tv with the converter gives me more channels and less trouble than the two 46 and 47" digitals, which are both on a digital antenna.  The analog with converter is on analog antenna.Be careful about ordering anything that has to come a long distance.  They said this one was probably juggled around in transport.I think the worst part is I have been told over and over that Samsung is best tv.  I thought my Philips was so much better, but it gave out in a little over 3 years.  I'm sorry I didn't just pay to have it fixed.I guess this was probably just a lemon, but it sure is disconserting to have it happen to me.IT IS NOW MAY 1ST AND I AM STILL WAITING FOR MY TV TO BE FIXED.  THEY SENT OFF FOR THE PART 8 DAYS AGO.

Reviews.Title: Buyer of used better BEWARE
Reviews.Author: little drummer boy
Reviews.Content: I bought a used/new in the box HDTV and it doesn't have a picture?#!!...needless to say, I'm not very happy at this point and I really doubt I will EVER buy anything else from you or your affiliates
